You are responsible for your decisions and choices.
Message 433 of 4024
You met with my Lawyer at close of business on a holiday weekend. I have spent that holiday trying to piece together your ask. You act like both of
our lawyers are sitting around waiting on me when you know that is not the case. Does yours carry a beeper over the holiday to hear what I have to say
in response to an undelivered ask?
You act like the physics of this situation are so cut and dry when you know the truth. And you know I have tried all weekend to figure out what you
are asking. And then today (the 5th day as you like to say) you send me a list and start talking about some top secret sliding scale that I should have
complied with as you tell me how horrible my attorney is.
I can’t do anymore and you are acting like I’m sitting on my hands. It’s simply not true and you know that.

Message 458 of 4024
Christine, I apologize for not informing you about my access to the Blink garage camera last week. I understand that this has caused an invasion of
your personal privacy, and for that, I am truly sorry. I want to assure you that my intention was never to monitor you or the boys in a way that would
compromise your privacy. I acknowledge your concerns, and in light of those, believe it would be best for us to separate any shared services, such as
ATT and Xfinity, where activity information is accessible to both of us. This will ensure you feel comfortable and secure, knowing that you are not
under any form of surveillance. Every account we have is shared today, so you are of course free to examine anything you’d like.
Regarding your concerns about cameras and electronic monitoring, the Blink cameras at the front door and garage door were installed when we both
lived in the home. They are plainly visible and serve as deterrents to potential intruders, similar to our security signs. These are the only cameras in
place. To explain what happened, I believe when the movers were there Tuesday with all the doors open, the wifi connection to the Blink cameras
refreshed.  The cameras have not worked in the past because they are too far from our wifi.  But with a clear line of sight and wifi signal, it allowed the
camera(s) to reconnect unexpectedly. But I can confirm I never watched a livestream. I opened an alert when it fired, reviewed move pictures of the
house taken Tuesday, and various other apps and photostories (at different times) when Adrian was visiting Wednesday. I did not know he had any
concerns at the time, but would have addressed them immediately if I had.
I am sorry my actions invaded your privacy. This won't happen again. There are no audio or video surveillance devices inside or outside the Kirkland
Sent:01/17/2024 at 07:31 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/17/2024 at 07:39 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg

home. Note I saw a camera connect Monday around 3:00 PM as mentioned, so am not sure what's going on, but I notified you the moment I saw it
for full disclosure and recommend you disconnect the camera. I would also be happy to show you how to (1) verify there is no monitoring via the
Xfinity network tools, and (2) change the network password to ensure your safety. I’m also available to help with any technical questions related to
this or data we have consented to share with service providers or one another. I want to be sure to alleviate your concerns. I am truly sorry this
happened and will be of service in any way I can moving forward to put you at ease.
-robert

Message 468 of 4024
First, my mental health has taking a bit of a beating too after my soulmate and mother of my children blew up my entire life without so much as a
warning.
In fact, it was the opposite of a warning. It was confirmation we were better than ever. I expected to hold your hand and care for you (just like I did in
Alki) till the day I took my dying breath.
Our vow was through sickness and in health. And I agree we share a lack of understanding for each other after your decision. But you are not solo in
struggling with the outcome of July 4th and then July 5th.
Lastly, if you are just telling me that you are not going to be involved in this and expect me to mop up our entire love life here and send it in a Lugg,
that is news to me. So we should clear up if you are washing your hands clean of Alki commitments, like you did me.
And I don’t care to fight. But I have a right to my own feelings. You express yours every time we talk. Once a week via a text does not seem
inappropriate. And as I said, I don’t want to fight. I’m just trying to coordinate the situation that I was left to navigate.
If you turn on text we can do this much more effectively. I assure you I will stick to our rules.

So it’s frustrating dealing with you. You never respond to what I have said. Ever. I did not say you put him in the middle of this. Just like I did not say
I needed to enter the house to move when I suggested FaceTime instead. You respond to words you want me to have said so you can justify a fight. It’
s unproductive. We have to go back and forth and show you I never said it, putting the real issue on pause. Then you get pissed when you realize that,
and cut off communication so the issue is never addressed.
If there was inappropriate behavior of any sort I should be alerted. That’s the way things should work as parents of shared children. You say it was
appalling and he should have never seen it like this is some sort of porn situation. But again you won’t tell me what it is. What if whatever he thinks he
saw actually has a reasonable explanation? Is there any possibility that he might have not understood what he was seeing? Because I sure as hell did not
open any of your nudie pics, our Amazon shopping history of kinky bondage and sex toys, or your hidden KO folder of pics and gifts swapped. And
that is the only thing I can think of that meets this bar.
Wrt to Lawyers, I have been telling you that we should connect for a week. I think just presuming that there is no interest or I have been dumped as a
client is again, you making things up in your own mind. I have tried to communicate for a week now. But somehow you are 100% privy to everything
and I’m totally in the dark. Don’t you think there is an issue there? Is this really serving our best interests to say that we are not interested in trying to
resolve your super top secret, unshared, black box event that only you and AD can know, but not me, the parent who supposedly did it?
